  • Constructor Details

    • Plane

      private Plane​(double x1, double x2, double y1, double y2, double step)
      Private constructor for plane
      Parameters:
      x1 - shorter side's left coordinate
      x2 - shorter side's right coordinate
      y1 - longer side's left coordinate
      y2 - longer side's right coordinate
      step - step between two consecutive points

  • Method Details

    • carreDT

      public static Model.Plane carreDT​(double x, double step)
      Static factory used to create a square plane
      Parameters:
      x - side's coordinate (negative for left)
      step - the difference between a pixel and the next
      Returns:
      a new square plane

    • rectDT

      public static Model.Plane rectDT​(double x, double y, double step)
      Static factory used to create a rectangle plane
      Parameters:
      x - shorter side's coordinate (negative for left)
      y - longer side's coordinate (negative for left)
      step - the difference between a pixel and the next
      Returns:
      a new rectangle plane

    • custDT

      public static Model.Plane custDT​(double x1, double x2, double y1, double y2, double step)
      Static factory used to create a custom plane: x1 is lower than x2 and y1 lower than y2
      Parameters:
      x1 - shorter side's left coordinate
      x2 - shorter side's right coordinate
      y1 - longer side's left coordinate
      y2 - longer side's right coordinate
      step - step between two points
      Returns:
      a new custom plane

    • NbPixelX

      public int NbPixelX()
      Returns:
      the number of pixels on the X axis

    • NbPixelY

      public int NbPixelY()
      Returns:
